name: Jack's Lucky Adventure!
description:
In this game, you play as Jack Manifold who hears a suspicious noise in his wine cabinet and goes to investigate. What he finds just might change his life! 

Will you get transported to FairyLand? Or will you get gruesomely thrown into the atmosphere! Play to find out! 

Different decisions you make in-game will determine what happens, so beware!

There are a total of 3 endings! 

(This is a fan-game, I am not affiliated with Jack Manifold or Jacksepticeye. If either of them request for the taking down of this game, I will do it swiftly!) 

All of the images used in this game were stock images, and all of the music was royalty free! :)
